name: ListCreditNotes
description:
Retrieve and filter a list of credit notes.

Retrieve a paginated list of credit notes using filters and sorting based on date, status, amount, customer details, items, taxes, and custom fields.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: ID of the organization for which you want to list credit notes. Required for identification and retrieval.

value_schema.description: ID of the organization

parameters.name: credit_note_number
parameters.description: Filter credit notes by a specific credit note number. The number must be a unique identifier, up to 100 characters.

value_schema.description: Filter credit notes by specific credit note number. Use this parameter to search for a particular credit note by its unique number. Max-Length [100]

parameters.name: filter_date
parameters.description: Filter credit notes by the date they were raised. Use yyyy-mm-dd format to search for specific credit notes.

value_schema.description: Filter credit notes by the date they were raised. Use yyyy-mm-dd format to search for credit notes created on a specific date.

parameters.name: filter_by_status
parameters.description: Specify the status to filter credit notes. Options include: 'open', 'closed', 'void', or 'draft'.

value_schema.description: Filter credit notes by their current status. Allowed values: open, closed, void, or draft.

parameters.name: filter_by_total_amount
parameters.description: Filter credit notes by their total amount. Input a specific total value to retrieve matching credit notes.

value_schema.description: Filter credit notes by their total amount. Use this parameter to search for credit notes with a specific total value.

parameters.name: filter_by_reference_number
parameters.description: Filter credit notes by their reference number, limited to 100 characters.

value_schema.description: Filter credit notes by their reference number. Use this parameter to search for credit notes with a specific reference number. Max-Length [100]

parameters.name: filter_by_customer_name
parameters.description: Filter credit notes by customer name. Use to search for credit notes associated with a specific customer. Max-Length is 100 characters.

value_schema.description: Filter credit notes by customer name. Use this parameter to search for credit notes associated with a specific customer. Max-Length [100]

parameters.name: filter_by_item_name
parameters.description: Search for credit notes by item name. Maximum length is 100 characters.

value_schema.description: Filter credit notes by item name. Use this parameter to search for credit notes containing specific items. Max-Length [100]

parameters.name: filter_by_customer_id
parameters.description: Search for credit notes associated with a specific customer using the customer ID. Retrieve customer IDs from the contacts API.

value_schema.description: Filter credit notes by customer ID. Use this parameter to search for credit notes associated with a specific customer. Retrieve customer IDs from the contacts API.

parameters.name: filter_by_item_description
parameters.description: Filter credit notes by item description. Use 'startswith:' or 'contains:' for flexible matching. Max length of 100 characters.

value_schema.description: Filter credit notes by item description. Supports variants item_description_startswith and item_description_contains for flexible searching. Max-length [100]

parameters.name: filter_by_item_id
parameters.description: Filter credit notes by item ID to find notes containing a specific item. Obtain item IDs from the items API.

value_schema.description: Filter credit notes by item ID. Use this parameter to search for credit notes containing a specific item. Retrieve item IDs from the items API.

parameters.name: filter_by_line_item_id
parameters.description: Search for credit notes containing a specific line item using its ID.

value_schema.description: Filter credit notes by line item ID. Use this parameter to search for credit notes containing a specific line item within the credit note.

parameters.name: filter_by_tax_id
parameters.description: Filter credit notes using a specific tax ID. Retrieve the tax ID from the taxes API.

value_schema.description: Filter credit notes by tax ID. Use this parameter to search for credit notes with a specific tax applied. Retrieve tax IDs from the taxes API.

parameters.name: status_filter
parameters.description: Filter credit notes by status using predefined values: 'Status.All', 'Status.Open', 'Status.Draft', 'Status.Closed', 'Status.Void'.

value_schema.description: Filter credit notes by status using predefined status values. Allowed values: Status.All, Status.Open, Status.Draft, Status.Closed, and Status.Void.

parameters.name: search_text
parameters.description: Search credit notes across multiple fields like credit note number, customer name, and reference number. Max-length is 100 characters.

value_schema.description: Search credit notes using text search across multiple fields. Searches credit note number, customer name, and reference number. Max-length [100]

parameters.name: sort_credit_notes_by_column
parameters.description: Specify the column by which to sort the credit notes. Allowed values: 'customer_name', 'creditnote_number', 'balance', 'total', 'date', and 'created_time'.

value_schema.description: Sort credit notes by specified column. Allowed values: customer_name, creditnote_number, balance, total, date, and created_time.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. Specify which page of results to retrieve. Default is 1.

value_schema.description: Page number for pagination. Specify which page of results to retrieve. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: records_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of credit notes to be returned per page for pagination. Default is 200.

value_schema.description: Number of records per page for pagination. Controls how many credit notes are returned in each page. Default value is 200.
